=== Introduction ===
"Texmaker is a free, modern and cross-platform LaTeX editor for linux, macosx and windows systems that integrates many tools needed to develop documents with LaTeX, in just one application."
The Texmaker website is at: http://www.xm1math.net/texmaker/

=== Installation ===
<nowiki>[[apt:texmaker|Install the ''texmaker'' package]]</nowiki>

=== Comparison Between Texmaker and Kile ===

Kile is more feature rich than Texmaker at present. Unlike Kile, Texmaker does not depend on KDE in any essential way, though it is written in QT.
